<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105250</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105250</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202678</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Early North Carolina Exploration (warm-up activity)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Frühe Nord-Carolina Erforschung (Vorwärmung 
Aktivität)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Exploration du nord tôt de la Caroline 
(activité de préchauffage)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Exploração adiantada de North.carolina 
(atividade do warm-up)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esplorazione iniziale del North.carolina 
(attività di preriscaldamento)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόωρη εξερεύνηση της βόρειας Καρολίνας 
(δραστηριότητα προθέρμανσης)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Exploración temprana de Carolina del Norte 
(actividad del calentamiento)</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson is intended to be used at the beginning of a unit that examines the early exploration of the North Carolina coast and its inhabitants. Through drawings published in Thomas Hariot's "A Briefe and True Report of the New Found Land of Virginia" teachers can raise student's interest in this unit.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion soll am Anfang einer Maßeinheit 
verwendet werden, die die frühe Erforschung der Nord-Carolina Küste 
und seiner Einwohner überprüft. Durch die Zeichnungen, die 
Thomas Hariots "ein veröffentlicht werden, Briefe und ein 
zutreffender Report des neuen gefundenen Landes von Virginia" in den 
Lehrern können Interesse des Kursteilnehmers an dieser Maßeinheit 
aufwerfen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon est destinée pour être utilisée au
début d'une unité qui examine l'exploration tôt de la côte 
du nord de la Caroline et de ses habitants. Par des schémas
édités en professeurs de Virginie de Thomas Hariot "un Briefe et un 
état vrai de la nouvelle terre trouvée" peuvent soulever l'intérêt
de l'étudiant pour cette unité.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição é pretendida ser usada no começo de
uma unidade que examine a exploração adiantada da costa de 
North.carolina e de seus habitantes. Através dos desenhos 
publicados em professores de Virgínia de Thomas Hariot "um Briefe e 
um relatório verdadeiro da terra encontrada nova" podem levantar o 
interesse do estudante nesta unidade.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione è intesa per essere usata 
all'inizio di un'unità che esamina l'esplorazione iniziale del 
litorale del North.carolina e dei relativi abitanti. Attraverso 
le illustrazioni pubblicate negli insegnanti della Virginia del Thomas
Hariot "un Briefe e un rapporto allineare di nuova terra trovata" 
possono sollevare l'interesse dell'allievo in questa unità.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα προορίζεται να χρησιμοποιηθεί στην 
αρχή μιας μονάδας που εξετάζει την πρόωρη εξερεύνηση της ακτής 
της βόρειας Καρολίνας και των κατοίκων της. Μέσω των 
σχεδίων που δημοσιεύονται στους δασκάλους του νέου εδάφους του 
Thomas Hariot's "ένα Briefe και μια αληθινή έκθεση της 
Βιρτζίνια" μπορούν να προκαλέσουν το ενδιαφέρον του σπουδαστή για
αυτήν την μονάδα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta lección se piensa para ser utilizada en el 
principio de una unidad que examine la exploración temprana de la 
costa de Carolina del Norte y de sus habitantes. A través de 
los gráficos publicados en los profesores de Virginia de Thomas 
Hariot "un Briefe y un informe verdadero de la pista encontrada nueva"
pueden levantar el interés del estudiante en esta unidad.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:JOE HOOTEN
FN:JOE HOOTEN
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>

VERSION:3.0

END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105250</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
